data.title: Women’s Kidney Health Clinic I Massachusetts General Hospital
data.meta_description: Discover specialized care at a leading clinic for women managing kidney disease during their reproductive years.
data.text:
About the Clinic

The team at the Women’s Kidney Health Clinic at Massachusetts General Hospital is dedicated to guiding and supporting women with kidney disease, whether they are already pregnant, trying to become pregnant, or need long-term kidney care due to past issues like preeclampsia or high blood pressure during pregnancy.

Our multidisciplinary team includes highly skilled specialists in women’s health, each bringing unique expertise to address the complexities of kidney health and reproductive wellness. This includes specialists in maternal fetal medicine, also known as high-risk obstetricians, who specialize in managing pregnancies complicated by medical conditions like kidney disease. Our nephrology experts focus on optimizing kidney function and managing related health concerns, ensuring the best possible results for both mother and baby. Additionally, our team includes specialists in infertility, kidney genetics, endocrinology, cardiology, and nursing.

Services We Provide

We offer a comprehensive range of services designed to support women at every stage of their kidney disease journey while addressing their family planning needs. Our experienced team provides personalized consultation and long-term kidney care for women with varying stages and causes of kidney disease.

For patients who have experienced complications during pregnancy, such as preeclampsia or high blood pressure, we offer specialized ongoing care aimed at improving cardiovascular and kidney health for the long term. Our approach is focused on proactive management and tailored interventions to address the specific challenges associated with kidney disease and pregnancy-related complications.

As part of our comprehensive approach to supporting patients with kidney problems and family planning, we provide the following services:
